title: Higher Education Learning Theory-Based Strategies for Enhancing Science Concept Understanding

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level theoretical foundation in science and practical experience as a manager
context.additional_context: Experiential learning process for complex science concepts through VR simulations in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, emphasizing real-world applications with administrator/leader role considerations

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the impact of THEL theory's five variables (gender, age, opportunity, instructor knowledge, instructor confidence) on science concept comprehension
Learners can interpret science concepts presented in VR simulation environments with over 80% accuracy and apply them to real-world work scenarios
Based on the characteristics of the learning group (gender/age distribution), tailored concept explanation strategies can be developed and evaluated.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
